Summary: Watched what appeared to be a Satellite crossing the ski.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was in July at about 11:00 pm when my son and I were standng in our driveway looking at the stars. There were no clouds in the ski so you could see the stars very well that night. We stood there for a few minuets looking south skiward when I noticed what appeared to be a Satellite travling northward towards us. It reached right over head and then made a sharp turn towards the west and shot off very fast. I can only describe the speed as like a shooting star. I don't know of any Satellite that can do that. If anyone has seen a Satellite at night it just looks like a star moving across the ski so you can emagine what this looked like.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Commerce
There were no other sightings in Commerce on or around June 21st 2006
